name: Bomb Thrower
description:
!WARNING!

The game was kind of broken when I built it and I didn't have time to finish it.

It's a game made in the Blackthornprod game jam 3 with the theme "less is more". My game fits in with the core mechanic of exploding walls with bombs. But the more bombs you have the less damage they do. I didn't have much time to make a game since I have other things to do.

Controls:

AD - Left/Right

Space - Jump

LMB - Throw bomb

If your out of bombs press R to en the current run
